title: Honoring Heroes in History: Illustrations from the Coretta Scott King Award Books, 2001- 2005
short_description: The Coretta Scott King Award, established in 1970, recognizes the contributions African American authors and illustrators have made to the field of children's literature. This exhibition features a selection of original works of art from books that have received either winner or honor awards for their illustrations in the past five years.

input: Honoring Heroes in History: Illustrations from the Coretta Scott King Award Books, 2001- 2005
